09.05.2005 MW SCR#8133 --> NEw combobox
04.01.2006 MW SCR#9797 --> New task needed for INFS-selection
27.09.2005 MW SCR#9112 --> New combobox INFS_NAME

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INFS_CODE, INFS_NAME, b.CODE_DESCRIPTION from :2/infs A, :2/code B where B.CODE_NUMBERA3=A.INFS_CODE and b.CODE_LANGUAGE=':1' AND INFS_USEFORINFOCODE='Y' and b.CODE_TYPE=137 order by b.CODE_DESCRIPTION

select CCRY308_ADMNO, CCRY308_CLNTNO, CCRY308_COUNTRY, CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK, CODE_DESCRIPTION from :4/CCRY A, :4/CODE B, :4/CTRY C where B.CODE_NUMBERA3=a.CCRY308_COUNTRY AND B.CODE_TYPE=2 AND CODE_LANGUAGE=':1' AND C.CTRY_COUNTRY=A.CCRY308_COUNTRY AND C.CTRY_INACTIVE='N' AND CCRY308_ADMNO=:2 and CCRY308_CLNTNO=:3 order by CODE_DESCRIPTION
